reviews.review: very fun point and click adventure game

This game is literally the GOAT. You need to have a good internet and a moderate performance pc though  to be able to happily play the game if you reject the possibility of getting toxic teammates in mm which is highly optimistic and unlikely. :)

I would not recommend , because of the heaps of sh-it you have to wade through before it eventually becomes enjoyable. 
I can't even imagine how ebola this game must be if you're just starting now. There is basically no anti-cheat.
its hard at the start but you will get there and its really fun with a good team and if you have friends i really would recomend csgo to you
